pages.text: The pearleporter has 211 uses by default, and can be used on a mature $(l:creatures/clam)clam$() that is producing particles to retrieve items without harming it.

It can be enchanted with Unbreaking, as well as Luck of the Sea, which will increase the number of items produced.$(br2)Using a pearleporter on an immature clam will tell you how many seconds remain until it matures.
